body_html: @ailzhang So I looked into how multidim slicing is done on python tensors. It turns out that they dispatches to series of slicing calls (see #9701 ). :) So it's fine to do a loop over ndim. Putting this in cpp has the advantage of being faster and benefiting our cpp API users. Are there any other difficulties?

body: @ailzhang So I looked into how multidim slicing is done on python tensors. It turns out that they dispatches to series of slicing calls (see #9701 ). :) So it's fine to do a loop over `ndim`. Putting this in cpp has the advantage of being faster and benefiting our cpp API users. Are there any other difficulties?
